kata.name: CoinChange
kata.description: Code kata for making change with coins.
kata.text:
A vending machine dispenses change to customers after a purchase.

Various amounts of different denominations of coins may be available to make this change.

Provide change using the least number of coins.

For example, change of $1.30 with available coins of 1×50¢s;, 10×25¢s;, 5×5¢s;, and 6×1¢s; should return 1×50¢s;, 3×25¢s;, and 1×5¢s;.
